blocks.name: xaddeq0

blocks.name: xrinfm
blocks.content: The extended real numbers are unbounded below. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 28-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: le2halvesd
blocks.content: A sum is less than the whole if each term is less than half. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm le2halvesd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), cle, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, co(c2, cdiv, nat2)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cle, co(c2, cdiv, nat2)))
} = {
  breqtrd(co(c0, caddc, c1), cle, c2, co(co(c2, cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(c2, cdiv, nat2)), w0)
  le2addd(c0, c1, co(c2, cdiv, nat2), co(c2, cdiv, nat2), w0)
  rehalfcld(c2, w0)
  2halvesd(c2, w0)
  recnd(c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm le2halvesd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[+]c1)[≤]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[≤](c2[÷]2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[≤](c2[÷]2))
} = {
  breqtrd((c0[+]c1), cle, c2, ((c2[÷]2)[+](c2[÷]2)), w0)
  le2addd(c0, c1, (c2[÷]2), (c2[÷]2), w0)
  rehalfcld(c2, w0)
  2halvesd(c2, w0)
  recnd(c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: xlt2addrd
blocks.content: If the right-hand side of a 'less than' relationship is an addition, then we can express the left-hand side as an addition, too, where each term is respectively less than each term of the original right side. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Mar-2017.)

thm xrsupssd(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  sstrd(c0, cxr, c1, w0)
  xrsupss(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  supcl(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, cxr, clt, w0)
  a1i(w0, wor(clt, cxr))
  xrltso()
  syl(w0, wrex(hs0, cxr, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, cxr, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2))))))), wss(c1, cxr))

  ⊢ (w0 → sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℝ*)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <), ¬ sup(c1, ℝ*, <)[<]sup(c0, ℝ*, <))
  supssd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, cxr, clt, c0, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (sup(c0, ℝ*, <)[≤]sup(c1, ℝ*, <)↔ ¬ sup(c1, ℝ*, <)[<]sup(c0, ℝ*, <)), sup(c0, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*, sup(c1, ℝ*, <)∈ ℝ*)
  supcl(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, cxr, clt, w0)
  syl(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ*,(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[<]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ*,(hs1[<]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[<]hs2))))), c0 ⊆ ℝ*)
  sstrd(c0, cxr, c1, w0)
  xrsupss(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  supcl(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, cxr, clt, w0)
  a1i(w0, < ≺ ℝ*)
  xrltso()
  syl(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ*,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0[<]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ*,(hs1[<]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1[<]hs2))))), c1 ⊆ ℝ*)
  xrsupss(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1)
  xrlenlt(sup(c0, ℝ*, <), sup(c1, ℝ*, <))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

blocks.name: xrge0infssd
blocks.content: Inequality deduction for infimum of a nonnegative extended real subset. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Sep-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrge0infssd(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cinf(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt), cle, cinf(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
} = {
  xrnltled(cinf(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt), cinf(c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt), w0)
  sseldi(cinf(c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)
  infcl(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt, w0)

blocks.name: xrofsup
blocks.content: The supremum is preserved by extended addition set operation. (Provided minus infinity is not involved as it does not behave well with addition.) (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Mar-2017.)
